(Attachments: # 1 Index of Exhibits, # 2 Exhibit John Carreyrou, Theranos Voids Two Years of Edison Blood-Test Results, Wall St. J. (Oct. 16, 2015), # 5 Exhibit Joseph Rago, Elizabeth Holmes: The Breakthrough of Instant Diagnosis, Wall St, J. (May 25, 2016), # 9 Exhibit John Carreyrou, Safeway, Theranos Split After $350 Million Deal Fizzles, Wall St. J. (Nov. 10, 2015), # 10 Exhibit John Carreyrou, Theranos Whistleblower Shook the CompanyAnd His Family, Wall St. J., (Nov. 18, 2016), # 11 Exhibit Press Release, Theranos, Inc., Statement from Theranos (Oct. 15, 2015), # 12 Exhibit Theranos, Inc. (Oct. 16, 2015), # 18 Exhibit Press Release, Theranos, Inc., Theranos Founder and CEO Elizabeth Holmes Speaks at Arizona Bill Signing, (Apr. 6, 2015), # 19 Exhibit Press Release, Theranos, Inc., Statement from Theranos (Oct. 28, 2015), # 20 Exhibit John Carreyrou, U.S. Probes Theranos Complaints, Wall St. J. (Dec. 20, 2015), # 21 Exhibit Christopher Weaver, John Carreyrou, and Michael Siconolfi, Theranos Is Subject of Criminal Probe by U.S., Wall St. J. recap_documents.description: ORDER The "Motion of the Ultra Petroleum Investor Group for Consolidation of the Actions, Appointment as Lead Plaintiff, and Approval of Selection of Lead Counsel" (Doc. # 26 ) is GRANTED; The Bussom v. Watford, et al., action (No. 20-cv-02820-KLM), filed September 17, 2020, is CONSOLIDATED with this action; Ultra Petroleum Investor Group is APPOINTED as lead Plaintiff; The law firms of Levi & Korsinsky, LLP and Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. are APPROVED as co- lead counsel and Berens Law LLC is APPROVED as liaison counsel; Altman's and Kuruppasamy's Motions (Docs. # 15 and 22 ) are GRANTED to the extent the seek consolidation and DENIED to the extent they seek appointment as lead plaintiff and lead counsel; The motions filed by Plaintiffs Weber, Mao, and Slaight (Docs. ## 18, 23, 24 ), are GRANTED to the extent the seek consolidation and DENIED to the extent they seek appointment as lead plaintiff and lead counsel; All future filings in these consolidated actions shall be filed in case number 20-cv-2652-CMA-STV using the caption provided, by Judge Christine M. Arguello on 4/29/2021. (evana, ) (Entered: 04/29/2021)
